title: New: Shivum Sharma
body:
Having impressed in 2013 with a clutch of demos, London’s newest teenage sensation Shivum Shlarma has announced his signing toy National Anthem, and revealed a revamped version of Flicker.

A gorgeous, rolling ballad, there’s touches of everyone from James Blake, to The Anthers, to Willis Earl Beale. Stream Flicker below.

excerpt.full: Having impressed in 2013 with a clutch of demos, London’s newest teenage sensation Shivum Shlarma has announced his signing toy National Anthem, and revealed a revamped version of Flicker. A gorgeous, rolling ballad, there’s touches of everyone from James Blake, to The Anthers, to Willis Earl Beale. Stream Flicker below.
